Reviews.Title: Incomplete Product Details
Reviews.Author: Maycroft2 "Countess"
Reviews.Content: Bought this product to use in Nigeria as it's supposed to be a factory unlocked international version phone.Unfortunately when I received the phone in Nigeria, I discovered that it needed to be activated with an active US carrier sim card (such as T-Mobile/AT&T; etc) by making a call for at least 5 minutes, which will remove any region lock permanently to be used with all GSM Carriers worldwide.This information was not displayed on the phone ad and I'm really disappointed to have bought an international phone only to find out I cant use it in another country.I think this is quite deceptive and amounts to a misrepresentation.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Vander Morais
Reviews.Content: Phone and all accessories arrived in perfect condition.Battery came pre-charged so I could use the phone right away. The set up was easy thanks to the intuitive app preloaded into the phone. great size,weight and thickness,not to the mentioned the awesome Android JellyBean platform.Also, the duos sim card function is really worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Very good cell phone with dual sim card
Reviews.Author: PI
Reviews.Content: It is a dual sim card cell phone tha works very well. You hard ever have some delay during its operation and it works perfectly with both sim cards.

Reviews.Title: The Best one!!
Reviews.Author: Keyla S.
Reviews.Content: I bought it, I Live in Venezuela and it is working perfectly!. Phone and all accessories arrived in perfect condition. It was my best cellular buy! I really love it! The only negative aspect is the charger because the model cannot be used here in Venezuela unless you add an extension.

Reviews.Title: Perfect.
Reviews.Author: Dany Ashworth
Reviews.Content: I bought It, to use It in Argentina. My celular company is Movistar (telefónica de Espańa).Works properly in Usa and here.  It was my best celular buy! The size is very good, not so bigAs S4. This model has 2 chips ... Great to use with my personal line and my Work line together.The battery support 1 and half day by now.

Reviews.Title: No guarantee.- A big problem! The money you save is not saved at all if you need to repair the product or buy another one.
Reviews.Author: Roque Javier Albuja Ponce
Reviews.Content: When I bought this product I was really happy because I had a cell phone that worked really good, complied with all my requirements and let me use two SIM cards! I bought this product on December 2013 and used it to all it's potential untill february 16 2014. During the time the product worked it sometimes got hot, but nothing that had not happened with any other phone I've had in the past. But on december 14, the battery suddenly uncharged and the product was very hot. When I tried to charge it once again it didn't charge. When reviewing the problem on the internet, it is common that some Samsung cellphones come with a problem in the card that causes that the cell phone gets really hot and the battery uncharges really fast. On the product I bought the problem is even worst because it doesn't charge anymore.  In  consequence, the problem in the card impedes that I use it anymore.For this reason, I contacted the seller and they've let me know that they are very sorry to listen this, but nothing can be done because the product has no guarantee. This is something important for you to take into account before you buy this product. There is a possibility that your phone suffers the same problem as mine and having a guarantee at least for the first year is necessary.In my case they've suggested me to repair the dammage, but repairing it has a similar cost to buying a new one, and there is no guarantee that it will work.Take care that you buy an unlocked version and not an international version.Another negative point of the product is the charger it comes with. International version comes with an adapter for US plug, which makes the plug huge!My suggestion is that if you want to buy this cell phone, you contact another seller. The product is great, but needs a guarantee!

Reviews.Title: Very reliable cell phone
Reviews.Author: Vladimir
Reviews.Content: Item received exactly as described and in a timelty manner!!! Very reliable cell phone, it has all the features of any high grade iPhone, even better, since its unlocked and haas 2 sim cards!!A+

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Brian St Cyr
Reviews.Content: After reading lots of reviews about this phone I decided to buy it for my wife for Chritmas. She absolutely loves it. We live in Trinidad and Tobago so I was worried about whether it would work here. It has worked perfectly so far.

Reviews.Title: Truly unlocked and works with german SIM-Card
Reviews.Author: Max Mustermann
Reviews.Content: For quiete a while I was thinking of buying this phone, because there were a lot of confusing reviews and comments about this model all over the internet wheter it works with european carriers or not.So I would like to share my overall positive experience with this phone.I purchased the Model I9192 which is also written in exactly the same way on the phone's package, but it was not sealed or anything like that. Also from european phones I'm used to have stickers on the outside of the package which tell the IMEI of the phone, that's not available here either.Thanks to Surgetelecom the package was shipped with Fedex for free, so delivery was very fast! Highly recommend that shop!Then the problem if the phone is locked or what ever:I unpacked it and found a note in the package that told that it was the US-version of the phone and worked only with american carriers (north and south america). If you wanted to use it with some other SIM-Card, it told you would have to use an american card to make a call of at least 5 minutes in order to unlock the phone.Despite that note I directly put my german SIM-Card in it to give it a try. And it worked just like that!!! So even if the manual tells something different, my phone purchased from Surgetelecom end of April 2014 was fully unlocked!At the moment I am using a StraightTalk and a GERMAN T-MOBILE card in it and both work just as they should.All the technical stuff can be read out there online or in other reviews, in a nutshell, I have never seen a dual-sim phone that worked so smoothly!!!Rooting was very easy, kernel supports a lot of root apps (droidwall, cisco AnyConnect, FolderMount to better integrate the external SD-Card)Of course the problem with the external SD-Card is always present on a Samsung phone, but with the help of FolderMount you can easily gain more space for apps and their data.

Reviews.Title: Working well and it is used now by my husband in Cote d'Ivoire
Reviews.Author: Djeneba Coulibaly-Traore
Reviews.Content: Good product hope it will work well for a long time.It is also taking great pictures and movies. It is fine.

Reviews.Title: muy buen telefono. increible-very good phone. incredible
Reviews.Author: FRANCISCO CHIRINOS
Reviews.Content: Lo recomiendo 100%  un telefono comodo y eficiente provisto de muchas funciones y de un rendimiento insuperable. el unico problema fue que lo adquiri porque en las especificaciones del producto decia unas bandas especificas y no eran las que describia  asi que solo levanta H+ con digitel aqui en venezuela.- 100% recommend a comfortable and efficient phone equipped with many features and outstanding performance. the only problem was that I acquired because product specifications about specific bands and thought this were not so single which described H + with digitel up here in Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: Nice smart phone
Reviews.Author: gordster
Reviews.Content: I've been using this phone for almost a month now.  I bought a GSM phone and didn't know what that was but It's compatible with everyone except verizon.  I was trying to get away from them anyway so that was OK by me.  I went to Walmart and got straight talk.  I'm through with contracts and have to wait for the families contracts to end in Aug to finally move all of them from the V.  to ATT.  This phone works really well, I'm kind of slow when it comes to these fancy smart phones and miss the simplicity of my flip phone.  I can check emails, FB and text, plus call all at the same time, quite an impressive phone.  If i was gonna do it all again i would probably get the regular phone not the mini.  My fingers are big and hit the wrong ones all the time.

Reviews.Title: Unfair Business Practices
Reviews.Author: PHILIBERT DIXON MEYOR
Reviews.Content: The Phone isn't looking real, the charger is still in the 90s models where you have to add an extension before you can use it. I decided to send the phone back to FGS Trading Co., the company I bought it from, they decided that 15% of my money will be taken for repackaging fees, I am very mad with the FGS Trading Co. and even Amazon for this Unfair Business Practices. Third class Chinese product is being forced on Customers for a money that it doesn't worth.

Reviews.Title: Yes.
Reviews.Author: carsysten
Reviews.Content: Very good choice...nice phone, fast shipping, good size and color, I loved it and all my friends get it after I got.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S4 Mini GT-I9192 GSM Unlocked Dual Sim - Black
